row.entry: This panel allows for a quick selection of images, according to some common criteria.

sect4.title: select all
sect4.para: Select all images in the current view (collection), with respect to the filters.

sect4.title: invert selection
sect4.para: Select all images that are not currently selected.

sect4.title: select film roll
sect4.para: Select all images that are in the same film roll as the currently selected images.

sect4.title: select untouched
sect4.para: Select all images that have not yet been developed.
